price: او په دې ډول موږ خپلې نښانې څرګندې بیانوو چې د مجرمانو لاره بيخي ښكاره شي.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti walitastabīna sabīlu al-muj'rimīna
